CustomField.description: Defines how this action is technically implemented within the system (e.g., using custom code, a visual flow, or a built-in standard function).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required. Select how this action's logic is implemented: 'Apex' (calls a custom Apex class), 'Flow' (invokes a Salesforce Flow), or 'Standard' (uses a pre-built framework action like creating/getting records). This choice determines which other fields below are required.
CustomField.label: Implementation Type
